short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes the Reddit modals more like twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reddit's redesign introduced a new modal view for posts. The main issue with it is that the sides are not scrollable. This extension takes Twitter's approach and makes the modal container scrollable rather than the modal itself.
